name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-app-hello-world-nodejs
title: Microsoft Teams NodeJS Helloworld Sample
shortDescription: Explore a comprehensive Microsoft Teams hello world sample app built with Node.js, demonstrating key features such as tabs, bots, and messaging extensions.
longDescription: This Microsoft Teams Hello World sample app demonstrates the integration of tabs, bots, and messaging extensions using JavaScript, providing a comprehensive foundation for building interactive and engaging Teams applications. Experience the full capabilities of Teams by exploring features that enhance collaboration and productivity within the platform.
